title: Bug 109718 - Large content in text item causes tips to show in one line
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN?? ?T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USER TOIDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text item

Expected Result:
tips shows in given format

Actual Result:
tips shows in one line
OB: When a large content is put in a text item, the tips are displayed in one line instead of the expected format.
EB: The tips should be displayed in the expected format, regardless of the length of the content in the text item.
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to the text item.
2. Put a large content in the text item.
3. Save the changes.
4. Put the mouse cursor on the text item and observe the tips format.
